title: KDF High Waisted Bell Bottom Jeans for Women Flare Jeans for Women Stretch Wide Leg Jeans
description: Fashion Bell Bottom Jeans with Removable Belt: These women's flare jeans are designed with a high waistline and the buttock lifting design accentuates the curve of the buttock to show your perfect curve and let you enjoy it.

Premium Fabric and Unique Snow Wash Process: These Comfy flare jeans are made of high-quality streach denim fabric, which has the characteristics of softness, breathability, elasticity, and good hanging sense. When you wear it, it is comfortable, breathable, and highlights your body.

Suitable for All Occasions: Our KDF bootcut jeans can be worn with shirts, vests, crop shirts, sweatshirts, jackets, high heels, sneakers, etc.Suitable for daily leisure, school, office, party, shopping, travel, and other occasions. And these women's flare jeans also are the perfect gift for your Friend, Mom at any festival such as Valentine's Day, Birthday, Halloween Day, or Christmas Day.

Bootcut Jeans Size Guide: US2: Waist: 24 inches, Hip: 32 inches； US4: Waist: 25 inches, Hip: 33 inches； US6: Waist: 26 inches, Hip: 34 inches； US8: Waist: 27 inches, Hip: 35 inches； US10: Waist: 28 inches, Hip: 36 inches； US12: Waist: 29 1/2 inches, Hip: 37 1/2 inches； US14: Waist: 31 inches, Hip: 39 inches; US16: Waist: 32 1/2 inches, Hip: 40 1/2 inches； US18: Waist: 34 inches, Hip: 42 inches.
